body:
I have a XMLDocument like:

	<Folder name="test">
	         <Folder name="test2">
	              <File>TestFile</File>
	         </Folder>
	 </Folder>
	

I want only the folderÂ´s, not the files. So, how to delete / manipulate the XML Document in c# to delete / remove ALL  elements in the document?

Thanks!
title: remove xml nodes from xml document
